channel.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
channel.description: some 1 know?! :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: February 19, 2007, 05:20:40 PM[/size][hr]please help?

item.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

Like lin said, get a test scape source. Then go into your character file, and edit your rights to 2. Save, but make sure your not logged in when you save! or else, when you logout - it will screw it up.

Read full topic

item.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Just download a Testscape Source!! Theres a folder with the people and you can just change 1 simple number!!! Trust me!! Its easier!! You can still access your server from the Testscape Client, too!

item.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
item.dc:creator: @I_own_in_wildy I_own_in_wildy
item.description:
@I_own_in_wildy wrote:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

Change Admin your username, and the player rights to your desired position. (That is the thing you have to find by searching admin).

Dont forget to save and compile.

Read full topic

item.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
item.dc:creator: @Kracya Kracya
item.description:
@Kracya wrote:

Replace Nvi Ible with your name and replace x91 with your name. Problem solved…

item.source: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?

item.title: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
item.dc:creator: @I_own_in_wildy I_own_in_wildy
item.description:
@I_own_in_wildy wrote:

To make yourself admin on testscape.
Open Client.java, ctrl+f, enter Admin, hit search and keep searching until you find something like.
Admin list 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner (Something like that I believe).
Change one of the peoples names below that to yours, and make sure the level is 2 or 3. 3 you cannot see your crown unless you fix something.

If you meant source, that is what you have to do.

Read full topic
item.source: I have testscape client how do i change my into an admin?
